Premium Wireless Headphones - XR500

Product Overview

Experience crystal-clear audio with our flagship wireless headphones.

Technical Specifications

  • Audio Quality

    • Frequency Response: 20Hz - 20kHz
    • Driver Size: 40mm
    • Impedance: 32Ω

  • Connectivity

    • Bluetooth 5.0
    • aptX HD Support
    • USB-C Charging

  • Battery Life

    • Up to 30 hours playback
    • Quick charge: 15 min = 3 hours
  • Active Noise Cancellation

    Advanced ANC technology blocks out ambient noise for immersive listening.

Frequently Asked Questions

General Questions
  1. What's included in the box?

    Headphones, carrying case, USB-C cable, 3.5mm cable, and quick start guide.

  2. How do I pair with my device?

    Hold the power button for 3 seconds and select "XR500" from your Bluetooth menu.

  3. What's the warranty period?

    2-year limited warranty covering manufacturing defects.

Technical Support

  • Troubleshooting
    • Connection Issues

      Reset by holding power + volume down for 10 seconds.

  • Maintenance
    • Cleaning Instructions

      Use a dry cloth for the exterior, avoid moisture near charging ports.
